item.title: First Script SIMPLE powerminer(w/randoms)
item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

this may help tell me if it doesnt helpâ€¦

program mining;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //////
rockcolor= 2437457; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var //////
loads: integer; //////
a, b: integer; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := â€˜â€™; //Username //////
Players[0].Pass := â€˜â€™; //Password //////
Players[0].Nick := â€˜â€™; //3 or 4 letters username //////
Players[0].Loc := â€˜â€™; //Leave as blank //////
Players[0].Skill := â€˜miningâ€™; //The skill for when you get a lamp //////
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + â€™ Playersâ€™); //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Procedure walktorocks; //////
begin //////
mouse(650,50,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(120+random(200)) //////
mouse(715,90,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
mouse(710,100,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
mouse(670,135,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(5000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(3000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(2000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(605,116,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
begin //////
if (findsymbol(x,y,â€˜miningâ€™)) then //////
wait(1000+random(2000)) //////
clickmouse(x,y,true) //////
writeln(â€˜In mining pitâ€™) //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
end; //////
end; //////

procedure ffight;
begin
if FindFight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(â€˜Nâ€™)
wait(10000)
RunBack;
end;
end;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure minethatiron; //////
begin //////
repeat //////
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,rockcolor,5,5,515,337,5))then //////
begin //////
Mmouse(x,y,3,3); //////
getmousepos(x, y); //////
if (IsUpText(â€˜Mineâ€™)) then //////
begin //////
mouse(x,y,2,2,true) //////
getmousepos (x, y); //////
wait(2000+random(4000)) ////// //////
FindPick; //////
FindNormalRandoms; //////
FindGas(a, b); //////
findfight; //////
wait(3000+random(4000)) //////
end; //////
end; ////// //////
if(findfight)Then //////
begin //////
runAwaydirection(â€˜nâ€™); //////
wait(5000+random(3000)); //////
runBack; //////
end; //////
until(invfull) //////
if(invfull=true)then //////
loads :=loads + 1; //////
end; //////
//////
//////
//////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////
Procedure dropalliron; //////
begin //////
wait(2000+random(4000)); //////
dropto(2,28); //////
findnormalrandoms; //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(â€™â€¦progress reportâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦Mined:â€™ + inttostr(loads) + â€™ loadsâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™.Made By JR. Scar WRiterâ€¦â€™);
end;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
begin
writeln(â€˜You are now running, my first, beautiful, POWER IRON MINER!!â€™)
setupSRL;
setupSRLmining;
declareplayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
findpickheadcolor;
setrun(true)
walktorocks;
repeat
FindNormalRandoms;
ffight;
minethatiron;
dropalliron;
ProgressReport;
until(loads>(59))
end.

Read full topic

item.title: First Script SIMPLE powerminer(w/randoms)
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Ok ok now, I was bored tonight so i decided to see if i can add randoms to my script.
I tried the hardest i can and i think this would work but for some reason when the drunken elf came along it didnt respond to him and i did fill out the declare players(dont know how to fix this, if someone can thatâ€™ll be greatful).

NOTE:Do not leave this script running without supervision, i do not think the anti randoms work AND this script is supposed to walk from varrock east bank to the mining areaâ€¦AND do NOT tell me the walking coords are messed up because i already know and i will fix them sooner or later.

Do not hesitate to leave any tips and compliments
All you have to do is fill out the declare players procedureâ€¦
Here it is:

[scar]program mining;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //////
rockcolor= 2437457; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var //////
loads: integer; //////
a, b: integer; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := â€˜â€™; //Username //////
Players[0].Pass := â€˜â€™; //Password //////
Players[0].Nick := â€˜â€™; //3 or 4 letters username //////
Players[0].Loc := â€˜â€™; //Leave as blank //////
Players[0].Skill := â€˜miningâ€™; //The skill for when you get a lamp //////
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + â€™ Playersâ€™); //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Procedure walktorocks; //////
begin //////
mouse(650,50,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(120+random(200)) //////
mouse(715,90,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
mouse(710,100,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
mouse(670,135,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(5000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(3000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(2000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(605,116,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
begin //////
if (findsymbol(x,y,â€˜miningâ€™)) then //////
wait(1000+random(2000)) //////
clickmouse(x,y,true) //////
writeln(â€˜In mining pitâ€™) //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
end; //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure minethatiron; //////
begin //////
repeat //////
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,rockcolor,5,5,515,337,5))then //////
begin //////
Mmouse(x,y,3,3); //////
getmousepos(x, y); //////
if (IsUpText(â€˜Mineâ€™)) then //////
begin //////
mouse(x,y,2,2,true) //////
getmousepos (x, y); //////
wait(2000+random(4000)) ////// //////
FindPick; //////
FindNormalRandoms; //////
FindGas(a, b); //////
findfight; //////
wait(3000+random(4000)) //////
end; //////
end; ////// //////
if(findfight)Then //////
begin //////
runAwaydirection(â€˜nâ€™); //////
wait(5000+random(3000)); //////
runBack; //////
end; //////
until(invfull) //////
if(invfull=true)then //////
loads :=loads + 1; //////
end; //////
//////
//////
//////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////
Procedure dropalliron; //////
begin //////
wait(2000+random(4000)); //////
dropto(2,28); //////
findnormalrandoms; //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(â€™â€¦progress reportâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦Mined:â€™ + inttostr(loads) + â€™ loadsâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™.Made By JR. Scar WRiterâ€¦â€™);
end;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
begin
writeln(â€˜You are now running, my first, beautiful, POWER IRON MINER!!â€™)
setupSRL;
setupSRLmining;
declareplayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
findpickheadcolor;
setrun(true)
walktorocks;
repeat
minethatiron;
dropalliron;
ProgressReport;
until(loads>(59))
end.[/scar]

~Jr

item.title: First Script SIMPLE powerminer(w/randoms)
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I think i have just completed this script but i keep getting errors with the dam mining anti-randoms that say exception something so i just took them out but it seems to run pretty smoothly, and yes i did have alot of help with certain things that mou53m4t and nashi helped me on(rock on guys!).
Give me some tips and compliments
Enjoy
~jR
(REMEMBER: it has NO ANTI-RANDOMS, and you must start in Varrock east bank in the middle bank booth, as he walks to the mining area.)

something happened with script so its in next post sorry
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 26, 2006, 02:05:47 PM[/size][hr][scar]program mining;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //////
rockcolor= 1910851; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var //////
loads: integer; ////// //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Procedure walktorocks; //////
begin //////
mouse(650,50,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(120+random(200)) //////
mouse(715,90,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
mouse(710,100,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
mouse(670,135,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(5000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(3000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(660,150,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
wait(2000+random(1000)) //////
mouse(605,116,0,0,true) //////
flag; //////
begin //////
if (findsymbol(x,y,â€˜miningâ€™)) then //////
wait(1000+random(2000)) //////
clickmouse(x,y,true) //////
writeln(â€˜In mining pitâ€™) //////
wait(100+random(2000)) //////
end; //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := â€˜â€™; //Username //////
Players[0].Pass := â€˜â€™; //Password //////
Players[0].Nick := â€˜â€™; //3 or 4 letters username //////
Players[0].Loc := â€˜â€™; //Leave as blank //////
Players[0].Skill := â€˜miningâ€™; //The skill for when you get a lamp //////
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + â€™ Playersâ€™); //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure minethatiron; //////
begin //////
repeat //////
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,rockcolor,5,5,515,337,5))then //////
begin //////
Mmouse(x,y,3,3); //////
getmousepos(x, y); //////
if (IsUpText(â€˜Mineâ€™)) then //////
begin //////
mouse(x,y,2,2,true) //////
getmousepos (x, y); ////// //////
wait(2000+random(2000)) //////
end; //////
end; //////
until(invfull) //////
if(invfull=true)then ////// //////
loads :=loads + 1; ////// //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure dropthatshit; //////
begin //////
wait(1000+random(3000)); //////
dropto(2,28); //////
findnormalrandoms; //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(â€™â€¦progress reportâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦Mined:â€™ + inttostr(loads) + â€™ loadsâ€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™â€¦â€™);
WriteLn(â€™.Made By JR. Scar WRiterâ€¦â€™);
end;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
begin
writeln(â€˜You are now running, my first, beautiful, POWER IRON MINER!!â€™)
setupSRL;
declareplayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
